name: Rad Roller Demo
description:
Rad Roller is a 3D platformer inspired by the Marble Blast games, with some unique twists. Temporarily turn off or increase gravity on your way to getting the fastest possible time.

**Note: Since this is a demo, I've removed most of the progression so you can play whatever you like. In the main area, jump into the spheres to begin a level. Blue (Day) spheres will be easy, Orange (dusk) will be more challenging remixes, and Black (Night) will be the most difficult version.

You can quickly restart from the pause menu!

Controls (M+KB)

  • Move - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Jump - Space
  • Float (Turn off gravity for one second) - Hold Space while airborne
  • Sink (increase gravity) - Right Mouse Button
  • Pause - Esc

Controls (Xbox 360 Controller)

  • Move - Left Stick
  • Look - Right Stick
  • Jump - A button
  • Float (Turn off gravity for one second) - Hold A while airborne
  • Sink (increase gravity) - Right Trigger
  • Pause - Start

Finally, Rad Roller is on Greenlight. If you enjoy yourself, I'd appreciate your thumbs up. If you love or hate it, I'd really love to hear your thoughts in the comments.
